name: Roundwood, softwood, green, at mill, INW
description:
All weights given on an ovendry basis. Percent Moisture content (oven dry basis) = wt of wood wet - wt of wood dry/wt of wood dry x100
Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Questionnaires from 4 mills assumed to be representative of the softwood lumber industry in US Inland West.
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Meant to represent operations in eastern Washington, eastern Oregon, Idaho and western Montana.  Actual representative mill sample found in eastern Washington and Idaho only.

exchanges.description: Weight reported on an ovendry basis, density=436 kg/m3 based on oven dry mass

flow.name: Roundwood, softwood, green, at mill, INW

exchanges.description: Transport of bark over 129 km.  Note: mass of 1 kg ovendry basis = 1.6 kg at 60% moisture content.
Based on green specific gravity of 0.41 (od mass and green volume)

flow.name: Roundwood, softwood, average, at forest road, INW

exchanges.description: Transport of roundwood logs over 129 km.  Note: mass of 1 kg ovendry basis = 1.6 kg at 60% moisture content.
Based on green specific gravity of 0.41 (od mass and green volume)

flow.name: Bark, softwood, average, at forest road, INW

exchanges.description: Weight reported on an ovendry basis, density=436 kg/m3 based on oven dry mass

flow.name: Bark, softwood, green, at mill, INW
